name: Imagination Shard Fragment
description: A whimsical crystal shard that sparkles with creative energy. Images and dreams seem to swirl within its facets, each one more fantastical than the last.

properties.use_message: The Imagination Shard Fragment glows with creative potential, but yearns for its companion pieces...
properties.combine_message: The three fragments dance together in a display of pure imagination, forming a key of boundless possibility!
properties.origin: Gift from The Brave Little Toaster
properties.lore: One of three mystical fragments that, when united, will unlock the path to the Nexus Hub.
